titles.title: A resolution requesting the President to furnish a certain document to the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent).
Reported to House by House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent). Report No: 100-500.

bill.summary: 12/18/1987--Introduced. Requests the President, after consultation with the Director of Central Intelligence, to furnish to the House of Representatives the document, file, or report relating to statements made by Vietnamese Vice Foreign Minister Phan Hein concerning certain civilians and members of the armed forces held as prisoners of war or considered to be missing in action since the beginning of the Vietnam Conflict.
